```{r}
install.packages("corrplot")
install.packages("car")
```


```{r}
library(corrplot)
library(car)
```

```{r}
pizza <- read_csv("/Volumes/5ive3rds/CSULB/Classes/510/Data/ASCII-comma/Chapter 05/pizza.txt")
```


```{r}
fit12<-lm(Sales~X1+X2,data=pizza)
fit1<-lm(Sales~X1,data=pizza)
fit2<-lm(Sales~X2,data=pizza)
summary(fit12)
summary(fit1)
summary(fit2)
```

Scatterplot matrix
```{r}
plot(pizza)
```

Correlation matrix and plots
```{r}
Cp<-cor(pizza[,2:3])
Cp
```
Correlation matrix and plots
```{r}
corrplot(Cp,method="color")
```

VIFs
```{r}
solve(Cp)
```



MARKET DATA
```{r}
market <- read_csv("/Volumes/5ive3rds/CSULB/Classes/510/Data/ASCII-comma/Chapter 07/market.txt")
```

```{r}
Cm<-cor(market[,4:7])
```

```{r}
fitm<-lm(Y1~X1+X2+X3+X4,data=market)
summary(fitm)
```

Inverse Correlation matrix
```{r}
solve(Cm)
```

VIFs
```{r}
car::vif(fitm)
```
